data.title: Our Lady of Mercy Academy
data.meta_description: Our Lady of Mercy Academy inspires the hearts, minds, and spirits of young women to lead, serve and succeed in their colleges, careers, communities and lives.
data.text:
The Mercy Difference

Our Lady of Mercy Academy provides a comprehensive, college preparatory education rooted in Catholic values that develops and cultivates each student’s academic pursuits, personal gifts and talents in a safe and welcoming environment. We prepare young women to be life-long learners and empower them to use their God-given gifts to make a difference in our world. Throughout the student’s journey, every experience and academic opportunity is linked to and aligned with our Core Values which defines the attributes our students are expected to acquire and the steps they’ll take to gain them. At OLMA we inspire the hearts, minds and spirits of our young women to lead, serve and succeed in their colleges, careers, communities, and lives.

Our Lady of Mercy Academy graduates have the ability to think critically, communicate clearly, and solve complex problems effectively. They are women of integrity who are intelligent and self-motivated. Their success in high school continues into college, graduate school, and their professional lives.

She is a woman of integrity who is articulate, compassionate, and socially aware. Grounded in the teachings of Catherine McAuley, she recognizes the dignity of all people and is prepared with a moral and ethical compass. As an independent thinker open to growth, she is intellectually, socially, and physically equipped to assume her role as a source for good in the world.
